name: Backend API Setup
goal: Create basic FastAPI backend with core endpoints
expected_functionality: Backend server runs and responds to health checks
testing_instructions:
1. Start backend server
2. Test http://localhost:8001/health
3. Verify API documentation loads
success_criteria:
✅ Backend starts without errors
✅ Health endpoint responds
✅ API docs accessible

name: Frontend Setup
goal: Create React frontend with basic UI
expected_functionality: Frontend loads and can communicate with backend
testing_instructions:
1. Start frontend server
2. Open http://localhost:3001
3. Test basic UI interactions
success_criteria:
✅ Frontend loads successfully
✅ Basic UI elements work
✅ Can connect to backend

name: Core Features
expected_functionality: Users can perform the main system operations
testing_instructions:
1. Test main user workflow
2. Verify data processing
3. Check error handling
success_criteria:
✅ Main features work correctly
✅ Data flows properly
✅ Errors handled gracefully
